description: Greedy bin-filling algorithm operating directly on HDH hypergraph. Uses beam search to select candidates and automatically places all nodes of a qubit together.
author: HDH Team

param_descriptions.beam_k: Beam width for candidate selection (higher = more thorough but slower)
param_descriptions.reserve_frac: Fraction of capacity to reserve until bins reach 80% (helps load balancing)
param_descriptions.restarts: Number of random restarts to try (best result is kept)
